loras.title: Loras

civitai_api_token.title: Civitai Api Token
civitai_api_token.description: Optional: Your CivitAI API token. Only needed if you are trying to download CivitAI weights that require authentication. You can create an API key from the bottom of https://civitai.com/user/account

animatediff_models.title: Animatediff Models
animatediff_models.description: A list of HuggingFace or CivitAI download URLs (use line breaks to upload multiples)

huggingface_read_token.title: Huggingface Read Token
huggingface_read_token.description: Optional: Your HuggingFace read token. Only needed if you are trying to download HuggingFace weights that require authentication. You can create or get a read token from https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens

endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: input_file

param_schema.title: Input File
param_schema.description: Input image, video, tar or zip file. Read guidance on workflows and input files here: https://github.com/replicate/cog-comfyui. Alternatively, you can replace inputs with URLs in your JSON workflow and the model will download them.

parameters.description: Input image, video, tar or zip file. Read guidance on workflows and input files here: https://github.com/replicate/cog-comfyui. Alternatively, you can replace inputs with URLs in your JSON workflow and the model will download them.

parameters.name: workflow_json

param_schema.title: Workflow Json
param_schema.description: Your ComfyUI workflow as JSON string or URL. You must use the API version of your workflow. Get it from ComfyUI using 'Save (API format)'. Instructions here: https://github.com/replicate/cog-comfyui

parameters.description: Your ComfyUI workflow as JSON string or URL. You must use the API version of your workflow. Get it from ComfyUI using 'Save (API format)'. Instructions here: https://github.com/replicate/cog-comfyui

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: Quality of the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality.

parameters.description: Quality of the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality.

parameters.name: force_reset_cache

param_schema.title: Force Reset Cache
param_schema.description: Force reset the ComfyUI cache before running the workflow. Useful for debugging.

parameters.description: Force reset the ComfyUI cache before running the workflow. Useful for debugging.

parameters.name: return_temp_files

param_schema.title: Return Temp Files
param_schema.description: Return any temporary files, such as preprocessed controlnet images. Useful for debugging.

parameters.description: Return any temporary files, such as preprocessed controlnet images. Useful for debugging.
